query:
SELECT
          rp."permissionId" AS id,
          p."description" AS description
        FROM
          "User" u
        INNER JOIN
          "RolesOnUsers" ru ON u.id = ru."userId"
        INNER JOIN
          "RolesOnPermissions" rp ON ru."roleId" = rp."roleId"
        INNER JOIN
          "Permission" p ON rp."permissionId" = p.id
        WHERE
          u.id = $1
